title: Update GraalVM to 22.1.0 to address multiple CVEs

labels.name: triage/duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
### Describe the bug

GraalVM 22.0.0.2 is affected by:

- CVE-2022-0778
- CVE-2022-21449
- CVE-2022-21476
- CVE-2022-21426
- CVE-2022-21496
- CVE-2022-21434
- CVE-2022-21443

### More details

- See [Oracle Java SE Risk Matrix](https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpuapr2022verbose.html#JAVA)
- https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JAVA-ORGGRAALVMSDK-2769618
